metadata.synopsis: As the player approaches the abandoned house, they hear strange noises from inside, as if someone still lived there.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Approach the house at 71.534; 44.228; 38.583 in SCL.

0.speaker: Oliver
0.text: Someone's coming. Someone new. Maybe they want to play.
0.context: NodeContext: Hushed anticipation. Little giggle at the end.
